property.name: Rules
property.value: Gravity Zero: If you have no shields and no other [Gabriella, HolyPrincess] in your battle zone you may summon this creature withoutcost. Double Breaker When your opponent would win the game by attacking with one of theircreatures, you may destroy this creature. If you do, your opponentdoesn't win the game, and your opponent's creatures can't attack thisturn. At the end of your next turn you lose the game.

card.name: Change the World, Blue Divine Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, discard your hand.Then put all of your shields into your hand. (You can't use ShieldTrigger.) Then for each card you discarded, put the top card of yourdeck into your shield zone face down. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Galaxy Vortex: Choose 3 darkness creatures in your mana zone andput this creature into the battle zone on top of those creatures. Meteor Burn: When this creature attacks, you may put up to 3 cards under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, until the end of this turn all creatures in the battle zone, get -3000 power for each card you put in the graveyard in this way. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fortress: Choose one of your shields and attach this card to fortify that shield. When the fortified shield leaves the shield zone, put this card into the graveyard. (Use "Shield Trigger" abilities before putting this card into the graveyard.) All of your creatures break twice as many shields. If the fortified shield isn't fortified by any other fortresses,whenever the fortified shield would be broken by your opponent's creatures, you may return 1 of your other shields to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on one of your Samurai creatures. Samurai Generation (When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may generate a cross gear from your hand without paying its cost.) Accelerator (While this creature is crossed with a cross gear, this creature gains the following [Accelerator] ability.) [Accelerator] : When this creature attacks, you may choose 1 of your opponent's creatures and put it in their mana zone. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fortress: Choose one of your shields and attach this card to fortify that shield. When the fortified shield leaves the shield zone, put this card into the graveyard. (Use "Shield Trigger" abilities before putting this card into the graveyard.) Your creatures win all battles. If the fortified shield isn't fortified by any other Fortresses, whenever the fortified shield would be broken by your opponent's creatures, you may return 1 of your other shields to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross Gear When the crossed creature attacks, return all creatures in the battle zone that have "blocker" to their owners' hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on one of your Knight creatures. Whenever you cast a spell during your turn, you may cast a spell with a lower cost than that spell without cost. Double Breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vortex Evolution - Put on 2 of your Samurai creatures. When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put up to 2 non-evolution Samurai creatures into the battle zone from your hand. Those creatures get "Speed Attacker". At the end of the turn, destroy those creatures. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature attacks, you may put a creature with a power of 3000 or less from your mana zone into the battle zone. Double Breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Galaxy Vortex: Put on 3 of your creatures. At the start of your turn, play rock-paper-scissors with youropponent until you lose. If you win 5 or more straight times, search your deck. You may put any number of non-evolution creatures from your deck into your battle zone. Then, you may put any number of cards into your hand from your deck. Then, shuffle your deck. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: All spells returned from the shield zone to your hand gain "Shield Trigger".

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into your battle zone, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Put 1 cross gear from the revealed cards into the battle zone, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on 1 of your Samurai creatures. Whenever your opponent casts a spell you may untap this creature. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Plus: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top card of your deck face down under 1 of your shields. (Each card stack is still considered to be 1 shield.) When you use this creature's "Shield Plus" ability look at that shield and put 1 card from that stack on top of your deck.

property.value: Choose 2 creatures in the battle zone and tap them. Those creatures battle.

At the end of the turn you used this ability put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent must choose 1 card from their hand and discard it.
